About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Tues, Thurs, Fri 9am-8pm, Wed 10am-5pm and Sat 9am-5pm; closed Sun and public holidays. General reference assistance available. No copying services available, but researchers can use user-pays photocopier.

About.Acquisition focus: The Local History Collection deals mainly with the history of the City of Canningarea. (20% in-house).
